title: Pawnee City Website
blurb: Designed and developed a full-stack application using React and Django, featuring efficient database architecture to handle user interactions seamlessly. Integrated two RESTful APIs to enable dynamic data exchange between the front-end and back-end components. Implemented user authentication as a learning exercise, gaining valuable experience in access control and security concepts, while understanding best practices for production-grade applications.

title: PokeDex App
blurb: Built an interactive React application using Test-Driven Development (TDD) to ensure high code quality and maintainability. Leveraged the Poke API to fetch and display detailed data on all Pokémon species, creating an engaging user experience. Completed a series of predefined tests, demonstrating proficiency in TDD by successfully implementing a feature allowing users to create and save custom Pokémon teams dynamically.

title: Marlons Auto Shop
blurb: This site is currently in work!
